title.en: Clouds to Delight Amitābha, Melody of the Realm of Great Bliss

text.en: Lord of Sages, great bodhisattvas of the Three Families,
text.en-trans: tubpé wangpo rik sum sempa ché

text.en: The regent, Sthaviras and senior patriarchs,
text.en-trans: gyaltsab neten té rab chenpo dang

text.en: Six Ornaments and the rest—all the scholars and adepts of India and Tibet,
text.en-trans: gyen druk lasok pak bö khedrub kyi

text.en: Who came to elucidate the excellent path—
text.en-trans: tralwé lamzang jinyé jönpa yi

text.en: As your teachings flourish and endure long into the future,
text.en-trans: tenpa pelgyé yün ring nepa lé

text.en: May the Lake-Born Buddha’s teachings spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Emerging from the tradition that combines
text.en-trans: chöpa drimé tawa namdak nyi

text.en: Immaculate conduct and utterly pure view,
text.en-trans: zungdrel gyüpé kasol lé jönpa

text.en: Pioneers of Dharma in the Land of Snows, followers of the Early Translations—
text.en-trans: gangchen tenpé sol jé ngagyur bé

text.en: As your teachings flourish and endure long into the future,
text.en-trans: tenpa pelgyé yün ring nepa lé

text.en: May the Lake-Born Buddha’s teachings spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Bodhisattvas and protectors guarding this Snowy Land,
text.en-trans: changchub sempa gangchen kyobpé gön

text.en: Praised as custodians of the teachings of Seven Divine Dharmas,
text.en-trans: lha chödün den tenpé dakpor ngak

text.en: Source of many legions of holders of the doctrine, Kadampas—
text.en-trans: tendzin jewé jungné kadampé

text.en: As your teachings flourish and endure long into the future,
text.en-trans: tenpa pelgyé yün ring nepa lé

text.en: May the Lake-Born Buddha’s teachings spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Unrivalled by legions of scholars and adepts in India and Tibet
text.en-trans: do ngak zhé zhung jizhin tralwa la

text.en: At perfectly elucidating the views and texts of sūtra and mantra,
text.en-trans: pak bö khedrub jewé dren mi zö

text.en: Masters of the doctrine in its entirety, Sakyapas—
text.en-trans: yongdzok tenpé ngadak sakyapé

text.en: As your teachings flourish and endure long into the future,
text.en-trans: tenpa pelgyé yün ring nepa lé

text.en: May the Lake-Born Buddha’s teachings spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Extracting the wisdom essence of countless lords among siddhas
text.en-trans: drubwang gyatsö tuk kyi chü chung zhing

text.en: And combining the ocean of tantras into a single essential core,
text.en-trans: gyüdé gyatsö nyingpo chik drilwa

text.en: The peerless, direct path to accomplishment, Kagyüpas—
text.en-trans: damé drubpé seng lam kagyü pé

text.en: As your teachings flourish and endure long into the future,
text.en-trans: tenpa pelgyé yün ring nepa lé

text.en: May the Lake-Born Buddha’s teachings spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Mañjughoṣa himself appearing in human form,
text.en-trans: jampal yang ngö mi yi zuk su nang

text.en: Finely scented with the ethical discipline of threefold training,
text.en-trans: lab sum tsultrim zangpö dri denpa

text.en: Splendour at the heart of the community of Jambudvīpa, Tsongkhapa—
text.en-trans: dzamling düpé ü dzé tsongkhapé

text.en: As your teachings flourish and endure long into the future,
text.en-trans: tenpa pelgyé yün ring nepa lé

text.en: May the Lake-Born Buddha’s teachings spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Sovereign of the oceanic teachings of the Ancient Translations,
text.en-trans: ngagyur tenpa gyatsö khorlö gyur

text.en: Master of profound treasures, great regent of Padma,
text.en-trans: zabter ngadak pemé gyaltsab ché

text.en: Orgyen Chokgyur Dechen Lingpa—
text.en-trans: orgyen chokgyur dechen lingpa yi

text.en: As your teachings flourish and endure long into the future,
text.en-trans: tenpa pelgyé yün ring nepa lé

text.en: May the Lake-Born Buddha’s teachings spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Master of the ocean of non-sectarian teachings in the Land of Snows,
text.en-trans: gangjong rimé tenpa gyatsö dak

text.en: Sovereign authority of the seven wondrous forms of transmission,
text.en-trans: ngotsar kabab dün gyi khorlö gyur

text.en: Mañjughoṣa in person, Jamyang Khyentse Wangpo—1
text.en-trans: jampal yang ngö khyentsé wangpo yi

text.en: As your teachings flourish and endure long into the future,
text.en-trans: tenpa pelgyé yün ring nepa lé

text.en: May the Lake-Born Buddha’s teachings spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Master of an ocean of Dharma teachings—sūtra and mantra, kama and terma,
text.en-trans: do ngak kater chö tsul gyatsö dak

text.en: Pioneer of the Five Treasuries and guardian of beings in the Land of Snows,
text.en-trans: dzö ngé shingta gangchen drowé gön

text.en: Mighty lord of Speech, Yönten Gyatso—
text.en-trans: ngak gi wangchuk yönten gyatso yi

text.en: As your teachings flourish and endure long into the future,
text.en-trans: tenpa pelgyé yün ring nepa lé

text.en: May the Lake-Born Buddha’s teachings spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: You continually beheld the smiling face of the Lion of Speech
text.en-trans: mawé sengé gyé zhal taktu zik

text.en: And mastered the eight great treasures of courageous eloquence,2
text.en-trans: pobpé terchen gyé la nga wangjor

text.en: Lion of scripture and reasoning, Ajita—3
text.en-trans: lung dang rikpé sengei adzi té

text.en: As your teachings flourish and endure long into the future,
text.en-trans: tenpa pelgyé yün ring nepa lé

text.en: May the Lake-Born Buddha’s teachings spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: You are the wisdom play, the vajra dance of the secret body, speech and mind
text.en-trans: chimé drubpé rigdzin bimalé

text.en: Of the immortal vidyādhara Vimalamitra;
text.en-trans: sang sum yeshe gyutrul dorjé gar

text.en: You are Mañjughoṣa himself, Chökyi Lodrö—
text.en-trans: jampal yang ngö chökyi lodrö kyi

text.en: As your teachings flourish and endure long into the future,
text.en-trans: tenpa pelgyé yün ring nepa lé

text.en: May the Lake-Born Buddha’s teachings spread far and wide!4
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Through praying in this way, as the teachings
text.en-trans: detar soltab jitar mönpa zhin

text.en: Flourish and endure according to our aspiration,
text.en-trans: tenpa pelgyé yün ring nepa lé

text.en: May all the ills that beset the teachings and beings be pacified,
text.en-trans: ten drö güpé dungwa kün zhi zhing

text.en: And with the continuation of the immaculate Dharma,
text.en-trans: chö tsul drimé yündu nepa yi

text.en: May the Lake-Born Buddha’s teachings spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik
